name: SurgicalSiteBleedingAndOtherSurgicalSiteComplications
title: Surgical Site Bleeding and Other Surgical Site Complications
description: This set of values contains codes for Surgical Site Bleeding and Other Surgical Site Complications
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this data element is to identify patients diagnosed with Surgical Site Bleeding and Other Surgical Site Complications related to hip and knee procedures.),(Data Element Scope: Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Diagnosis category.),(Inclusion Criteria: This set of values contains codes for Surgical Site Bleeding and Other Surgical Site Complications),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
